# StringExtensions.ToBase64 method

Encodes the input String in base64 using specified encoding, if not specified by default the UTF8 encoding is used.

```csharp
public static string ToBase64(this string value, Encoding encoding = null)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | Value to encode in base64 |
| encoding | Encoding to use |

## Return Value

Returns input string with first letter is upper.
